MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: ADRC Uniform Data Set v2 - C1: MMSE and Neuropsychological Battery

age.Description: Age of the participant at visit

MMSELOC.Description: MMSE location. The administration of the MMSE was:

MMELANX.Description: Language of MMSE, other - specify (Blank if MMSELAN ≠ 3)

NPSYCLOC.Description: The remainder of the battery was administered:

NPSYLANX.Description: Language of test (neuropsychological battery), other - specify (Blank if NPSYLAN ≠ 3)

LOGIMO.Description: If this test has been administered to the subject within the past 3 months, specify the date previously administered: (month)

LOGIDAY.Description: If this test has been administered to the subject within the past 3 months, specify the date previously administered: (day) {1..31}

LOGIYR.Description: If this test has been administered to the subject within the past 3 months, specify the date previously administered: (year)

LOGIPREV.Description: Total score from the previous test administration {0..25}

LOGIMEM.Description: Total number of story units recalled from this current test administration:{0..25}

DIGF.Description: Digit span forward trials correct - Total number of trials correct prior to two consecutive errors at the same digit length {0..12}

DIGB.Description: Digit span backward trials correct - Total number of trials correct prior to two consecutive errors at the same digit length {0..12}

ANIMALS.Description: Category Fluency - Animals: Total number of animals named in 60 seconds {0..77}

VEG.Description: Category Fluency - Vegetables: Total number of vegetables named in 60 seconds {0..77}

TRAILA.Description: Trail Making Test - Part A: Total number of seconds to complete {0..150}

TRAILARR.Description: Trail Making Test - Part A: Number of commission errors {0..40} (Blank if TRAILA in {995..998})

TRAILALI.Description: Trail Making Test - Part A: Number of correct lines {0..24} (Blank if TRAILA in {995..998})

TRAILB.Description: Trail Making Test - Part B: Total number of seconds to complete {0..300}

TRAILBRR.Description: Trail Making Test - Part B: Number of commission errors {0..40} (Blank if TRAILB in {995..998})

TRAILBLI.Description: Trail Making Test - Part B: Number of correct lines {0..24} (Blank if TRAILB in {995..998})

WAIS.Description: WAIS-R Digit Symbol -  Total number of items correctly completed in 90 seconds {0..93}

MEMUNIT.Description: Logical Memory IIA - Delayed: Total number of story units recalled {0..25}

MEMTIME.Description: Logical Memory IIA - Delayed: Time elapsed since Logical Memory IA - Immediate (minutes) {0..85}

BOSTON.Description: Boston Naming Test - (30 Odd-numbered items) total score {0..30}

COGSTAT.Description: Overall appraisal: Per the clinician (e.g., neuropsychologist, behavioral neurologist, or other suitably qualified clinician), based on the UDS neuropsychological examination, the subjects cognitive status is deemed

Levels.3: One or two test scores abnormal
Levels.4: Three or more scores are abnormal or lower than expected
